description: This tough little ukulele goes to ski cabins or campsites to add live music to your spare hours. Includes a manual to get you started with a few simple tunes.Soprano sizing travels easily.Designed as homage to 1950s Maccaferi ukulele.Free Kala tuning app lets you dial in your uke’s sound using your smartphone’s microphone (requires iOS 7 or later, or Android 2.3 or later).Polycarbonate construction is durable, lightweight, and unaffected by moisture.Nickel-plated open gear tuners.Aquila Super Nylgut® strings.Dimensions: 53 x 16cm (at widest).Included tote bag doubles as backpack.Comes with a mini quick-start manual.
name: Kala Brand Music Co Waterman Ukulele
